page.title: ServerlessDays London - News
page.description: One Day. One Track. One Community

lead.headline: Announcing Keynotes and Speakers
lead.description: We're delighted to announce our keynotes and some of our first speakers. We're joined by Teri Radichel, Lin Clark, Till Schneidereit, and Sarah Drasner.

posts.headline: Announcing ServerlessDays London 2019
posts.description: ServerlessDays London 2019 is happening on 11 July at Imperial College, South Kensington. New venue, expanded program, more Serverless! Get your Serverless on!
